channel.title: Changing Item Prices [317]
channel.description: hey everybody, i have a problem, some items on my server are [s]screwed[/s] up and the prices are way over the limit, example: when i sell clay at the general store, its worth over 100k each, how do i change the price?!?!?!

item.title: Changing Item Prices [317]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

item.cfg

the first 3 integers in each item line (after the name and examine info) are the Shop buy, Sell, and alch amounts.

Read full topic
